courses.name: Introduction to Data Structures for Interviews
courses.description: Learn how to pass technical interviews by understanding the data structures you need to store and retrieve data efficiently in your everyday development.

courses.name: Rapid Development on AWS: React, Node.js & GraphQL
courses.description: Learn to build on AWS’ cloud services and its world-class infrastructure to easily add authentication, storage, databases, and APIs into your apps!

courses.name: JavaScript: The New Hard Parts
courses.description: Develop an intuitive understanding of the new features of JavaScript in ES6+: iterators, generators, promises, and async/await!

courses.name: Mastering Webpack Plugins
courses.description: Learn the Webpack 4 plugin system, tour the Webpack source code and learn to build custom plugins and custom Webpack loaders.

courses.name: Web Performance with Webpack
courses.description: Make websites load instantly using Webpack for lazy loading JavaScript with code splitting, removing unused code with tree shaking and prefetching assets.

courses.name: Webpack 4 Fundamentals
courses.description: Learn the core concepts of Webpack 4. Start from scratch by adding Webpack with npm and build up a pipeline with popular loaders from the Webpack ecosystem!

courses.name: Complete Intro to Web Development, v2
courses.description: More than an introduction, in this course you’ll go from building your first website to having the foundation for becoming a professional web developer!

courses.name: A Practical Guide to Algorithms with JS
courses.description: Learn to solve algorithms and analyze them efficiently in both an interview setting and also in your day-to-day development.

courses.name: Serverless with AWS Lambda
courses.description: Get started with AWS Lambda functions and then learn to test, debug and deploy then to build a real API powered by lambda functions.

courses.name: proident do non aute
courses.description: Ut aliqua exercitation in sit non adipisicing amet. Occaecat et fugiat minim officia ut in non et nulla. Nisi incididunt culpa ad magna do laboris.

courses.name: Advanced GraphQL
courses.description: Go beyond the basics to writing production-level, optimized GraphQL. Learn GraphQL techniques such as Nested Resolvers, Caching and Testing.

courses.name: Testing React Applications, v2
courses.description: Fix errors before your app reaches the end user by writing maintainable unit test & integration tests for your React applications!

courses.name: Advanced React Patterns
courses.description: Simplify large React applications by separating your component logic, state and display properties to make React components more flexible and usable!

courses.name: SQL Fundamentals
courses.description: Learn SQL, the most popular language for storing, querying and analyzing the relational data that powers your server-side applications.

courses.name: Content Strategy
courses.description: Get your content under control with an effective strategy! Research, take inventory and create a messaging framework for a cohesive voice for your website.

courses.name: Web Performance
courses.description: Write more efficient JavaScript, optimize rendering performance, load assets faster with a CDN, split loading resources with Webpack and more!

courses.name: Four Semesters of Computer Science in 5 Hours, Part 2
courses.description: Learning computer science makes you a better developer, makes your apps better, and allows you to answer difficult engineering interview questions.

courses.name: JavaScript: From Fundamentals to Functional JS, v2
courses.description: Learn higher-order functions, closures, scope, master key functional methods like map, reduce and filter and promises and ES6+ asynchronous JavaScript.

courses.name: Git In-depth
courses.description: A deep dive into git, this course is for developers who use it every day and want to learn inner workings and use advanced techniques in git.

courses.name: Full Stack for Front-Ends Part 2
courses.description: Deploy Node.js apps and configure Nginx using the command line. Setup SSH, firewall, server updates and configure nginx caching, gzip and HTTP2.

courses.name: REST & GraphQL API Design in Node.js, v2 (using Express & MongoDB)
courses.description: Design APIs from the ground up using Node.js Express and MongoDB! You'll build a REST API and in the course you'll migrate your API to using GraphQL.

courses.name: Building Awesomer Apps with Angular
courses.description: Learn Angular from the ground up. Get up and running quickly with the Angular CLI, then build a production-ready app using Components, Services and Routes.

courses.name: TypeScript Fundamentals
courses.description: TypeScript combines modern JavaScript language features with a powerful and flexible type system, to make building high-performance and scalable apps easy!

courses.name: CSS In-Depth, v2
courses.description: Take a deep-dive into the essential features of CSS, while also exploring CSS features you probably didn’t even know existed!

courses.name: CSS Grids and Flexbox for Responsive Web Design
courses.description: Master CSS Grid and Flexbox, the latest tools and tricks to layout beautiful, responsive web applications with less code.

courses.name: JavaScript: The Hard Parts
courses.description: Take your JavaScript to the next level. Gain an understanding of callbacks, higher order functions, closure, asynchronous and object-oriented JavaScript!

courses.name: Advanced Vue.js Features from the Ground Up
courses.description: Learn how to build accessible routing, state management, form validation and internationalization from the ground up by composing basic Vue.js features.

courses.name: JavaScript for WordPress
courses.description: Learn how to use JavaScript and AJAX to harness the power of WordPress for themes and plugins -- decouple your code using the WordPress REST API!

courses.name: Visual Studio Code
courses.description: Visual Studio Code is a modern, full-featured code editor built from the ground for the needs of web developers - JavaScript developers in particular.

courses.name: Web Security
courses.description: Get hands on attacking and defending web applications. Defend Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) and Man-in-the-Middle attacks, secure 3rd party assets and more!
